instruction: Generate a description of a modern home office with a focus on comfort and productivity.
output: The modern home office should feature comfortable seating, a spot for a standing desk and laptop, ample storage space, and plenty of natural lighting. Easy access to outlets is also necessary to keep modern devices powered. Soft textures and natural materials will provide a cozy and productive atmosphere. A few personal touches from artwork, plants, and photos can also add to the overall ambience.
